content:
Currently working for (Nov 2021 - Present) Tricentis as a Senior Software Engineer at R&D department.
Previously:
(Sep 2018 - Nov 2021) Software Engineer at Betsson Group
(Jun 2017 - Aug 2018) Software Engineer at Trendyol Group
(Oct 2015 - Jun 2017) Software Engineer at Inveon
(Aug 2014 - Oct 2014) Intern Software Engineer at Mews)
